attributes.action: Scrap the idea of smokers having to pay £10 for a permit before they can buy cigarettes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Firstly, could this just be about the millions, if not billions, of hard-earned taxpayers’ money you have given away to foreign countries, and the only way now to retrieve these monies is to penalise the smokers. What a deceitful and devious thought-out idea! And secondly, what about the millions of tourists  that come into this country every year - are you expecting them to purchase a permit before they can buy cigarettes?  So I would say scrap this stupid plan.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at : http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/smokingpermit/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
